name: House-elves
description: Loyal magical creatures bound to their owners as servants for life
appearance: Large heads, long noses and fingers, very short, with bulging, tennis ball eyes and bat-like ears
magicAbilities: Their own type of magic performed without a wand which includes the ability to apparate, disarm and make objects levitate
allegiance: Bound to serve one owner unless freed by being given clothes by that owner
